screens.text: Good morning Sean. It's a delicious morning. What are you going to do first?

links.text: Go to the small claims court

screens.text: Ahh. The toilet. So many memories. No time for toilet activities now though.

links.text: Stare in to your own mesmerising eyes

screens.text: Delicious. What a great way to start the day.

links.text: This is all very well but I am going to need the toilet now.

screens.text: It's filthy in here. You should really clean it, shouldn't you?

links.text: No way, it's my brain and I can do what I want with it
Yes, you are right. You are always right

screens.text: What's the matter, Sean? Haven't you ever cleaned a brain before? You know what to use don't you?
That looked like it was painful. Do you feel better now?

links.text: Yes, that washed away all of the nerves and I am ready for the small claims court
No. Is my nose ok? I need to check my face in the mirror

screens.text: WAKE UP SEAN. You have been laying on the bathroom floor of the small claims court for days now... Is that smell coming from your trousers?

links.text: Deny everything and resume your day
Run home for a quick wash and a bowl of Special K
